The image macro featuring a photograph o: Han Solo, and Jack Ryan was circulated on social media in January 2017.
The Twitter user: TheDefense13 posted the image macro claiming that Harrison Ford made the statement supporting Donald Trump just in time for the inauguration, but there is no record of Ford uttering those words.
Harrison Ford has been falsely portrayed: with a doctored image showing him holding a "Trump for President" sign in March 2016. Ford's representative clarified that he was not endorsing Trump for president.
In a December 2015 interview: Ford expressed his opinion about Trump, stating that he believed Trump was dealing in "divisiveness."
